mapper.select: SELECT s.SERIESKEY FROM "C##SAHMYOOK"."SERIESTAB" s WHERE s.STUDYKEY = #{studyKey} ORDER BY NVL(s.SERIESNUM, s.SERIESKEY)

SELECT i.IMAGEKEY FROM "C##SAHMYOOK"."IMAGETAB" i WHERE i.STUDYKEY = #{studyKey} AND i.SERIESKEY = #{seriesKey} ORDER BY CASE WHEN REGEXP_LIKE(i.INSTANCENUM, '^[0-9]+$') THEN TO_NUMBER(i.INSTANCENUM) ELSE NULL END NULLS LAST, i.IMAGEKEY
SELECT PID AS PID, PNAME AS PNAME, PSEX AS PSEX, PBIRTHDATE AS PBIRTHDATE FROM PATIENTTAB WHERE PNAME = #{patientname}

SELECT STUDYKEY AS studyKey, STUDYDATE AS studyDate, STUDYTIME AS studyTime, STUDYDESC AS studyDesc, MODALITY AS modality, BODYPART AS bodyPart, PATAGE AS patAge FROM STUDYTAB WHERE PID = #{pid} ORDER BY studyDate DESC, studyTime DESC

SELECT DISTINCT st.PNAME as "patientName", st.STUDYDESC as "studyDescription", st.STUDYDATE as "studyDate", st.PID as "pid", st.STUDYKEY as "studyKey", st.PATIENTKEY as "patientKey" FROM "C##SAHMYOOK".STUDYTAB st INNER JOIN "C##SAHMYOOK".SERIESTAB se ON st.STUDYKEY = se.STUDYKEY WHERE se.MODALITY = #{modality}
